publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7666 Hugh Henry: Gerry Raffertyâ€”That the Parliament is saddened by the death of the Paisley-born musician, Gerry Rafferty; offers condolences to his family and friends; considers that his Paisley roots had a huge influence on his artistic development; recognises his contribution to music in Scotland; further recognises his influence on musicians and music fans throughout the world, and believes that he has left a musical legacy that will continue to be enjoyed for generations to come.
